scripts.smoke: cross-env npm run prepare-reports && start http://localhost:5665 && k6.exe run --env TEST_TYPE=smoke src/main.js --out json=reports/smoke.json --out dashboard=reports/smoke
scripts.load: cross-env npm run prepare-reports && start http://localhost:5665 && k6.exe run --env TEST_TYPE=load src/main.js --out json=reports/load.json --out dashboard=reports/load
scripts.spike: cross-env npm run prepare-reports && start http://localhost:5665 && k6.exe run --env TEST_TYPE=spike src/main.js --out json=reports/spike.json --out dashboard=reports/spike
scripts.stress: cross-env npm run prepare-reports && start http://localhost:5665 && k6.exe run --env TEST_TYPE=stress src/main.js --out json=reports/stress.json --out dashboard=reports/stress
